title: LAP: The Impact of the Chilean Earthquake of 2010 (English)
description: Tomas Ocampo, Outreach Coordinator for Latin American Perspectives, interviews special guest editor Kristen Sehnbruch on the subject of the July 2017 issue: "The Chilean Earthquake of 2010: Challenging the Capabilities of the Neoliberal State.'"
content:encoded: Tomas Ocampo, Outreach Coordinator for Latin American Perspectives, interviews special guest editor Kristen Sehnbruch on the subject of the July 2017 issue: "The Chilean Earthquake of 2010: Challenging the Capabilities of the Neoliberal State.'"
